Holiday Money Get in touch Book a video call Make an enquiry Call 0800 713 715 Help Get in touch Back EXPLORE, UNWIND , DISCOVER View gallery / Back Great Keppel Island Hideaway beach Byfield Rainforest Byfield Rainforest walk Yeppoon Lagoon Sunset Capricorn Coast Singing Ship Great Keppel Island Hideaway view Capricorn Caves Yeppoon Lagoon Capricorn Coast Aerial Capricorn Coast Journey through the Capricorn Coast - Suggested Itinerary 6 night itinerary • Self drive • Sightseeing Overview Embark on a self-drive adventure along Queensland’s stunning Capricorn Coast, where every stop offers a new experience. Begin in Yeppoon, soaking up coastal vibes and ocean views. Journey inland to the awe-inspiring Capricorn Caves, where ancient limestone formations and the acoustics of Cathedral Cave leave a lasting impression. Take a short ferry across to Great Keppel Island for a night or two to enjoy snorkelling, hiking, and beachside bliss. Head north to the lush Byfield Rainforest, where walking trails and freshwater creeks invite you to reconnect with nature.This road trip blends coast, island, rainforest, and underground wonder. View more View less 6 night suggested self-drive & sightseeing activities EXPLORE, UNWIND , DISCOVER Enquire now Discover the ancient limestone Capricorn Caves which offer an unforgettable experience filled with history, adventure, and breathtaking formations. Great Keppel Island offers stunning white sand, crystal-clear waters, and uncrowded shores - pure paradise! The iconic Singing Ship which symbolizes Captain James Cook’s exploration of the region in 1770. The striking white sculpture that “sings” in the wind, creating eerie yet beautiful sounds Lace up your boots and hit the trails of Byfield Rainforest, where winding paths lead through towering palms, hidden creeks, and the thrill of discovering nature’s untouched secrets. SUGGESTED ITINERARY Day 1: Arrive Rockhampton to Yeppoon Arrive at Rockhampton Airport, collect your rental car, and drive to Yeppoon to check into your accommodation. Enjoy lunch by the waterfront, then spend the afternoon swimming at Yeppoon Lagoon. Wander through Yeppoon’s charming CBD before unwinding with a laid-back beachfront dinner. Day 2: Capricorn Caves tour Begin your day in Yeppoon and journey inland to the spectacular Capricorn Caves for the 10am tour, where ancient limestone formations and the awe-inspiring Cathedral Cave set the stage for an unforgettable underground experience. After exploring the caves, head back toward the coast to visit the iconic Singing Ship in Emu Park. Perched above the ocean, this wind-powered monument pays tribute to Captain Cook and offers sweeping views of Keppel Bay - the perfect spot to reflect and snap a few photos before returning to Yeppoon. Day 3: Yeppoon to Great Keppel Island Head to Keppel Bay Marina for lunch before checking in for your ferry transfer to Great Keppel Island. Settle into your accommodation at Great Keppel Island Hideaway, then unwind with dinner at the Hideaway Bistro and relax beneath the stars. Day 4: Great Keppel Island Explore the underwater beauty of the Southern Great Barrier Reef by stand-up paddleboarding, snorkeling, or swimming through crystal-clear waters teeming with diverse subtropical marine life. Day 5: Great Keppel Island to Byfield Rainforest After breakfast, hop on the early ferry back to the mainland and enjoy a scenic drive to the Byfield Rainforest - a serene escape into lush, tropical wilderness. Spend your day wandering shaded forest trails, spotting native wildlife, and taking a refreshing dip in crystal-clear creeks like Upper Stony. Whether you're relaxing beneath towering palms or browsing handcrafted goods in the charming Byfield township, this day trip offers the perfect blend of adventure, tranquillity, and local culture. Head back to Yeppoon for dinner, we recommend Vue Yeppoon. Day 7: Depart Rockhampton Depart Yeppoon for Rockhampton Airport. Our favourite places to stay: Salt Beachfront Apartments, Yeppoon Oshen Apartments Yeppoon Great Keppel Island Hideaway Choosing your Rental Car Take into consideration the size of the vehicle you require. We recommend a minimum of a medium sized SUV for two adults. This will give you space and freedom when you're travelling. Book your car with House of Travel before leaving home as this will save money and ensure you get the car of your choice.
